channel.title: 27 on Kamil Pro
channel.description: Recent content in 27 on Kamil Pro

item.title: 27 was a great number
item.description: but I’m certain that 28 will be even better! Yes, yesterday was my birthday. Another great year has passed but this time with a wonderful woman next to my side. It’s unbelievable how many good things have happened in the last 365 days. I could now start telling you and show off… but not on this occasion, this is a celebration time! On the days like these, I think about changing my settings to neutral, stop rushing and just sit calmly and wait for what comes next…anything… No.
